verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> month, in the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> as <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> in mine <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, that the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me.

Then I <S%H7200>beheld,<s%> and <S%H2009>lo<s%> a <S%H1823>likeness<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire:<s%> from the <S%H4480>appearance<s%> <S%H4758><s%> of his <S%H4975>loins<s%> even <S%H4295>downward,<s%> <S%H784>fire;<s%> and from his <S%H4480>loins<s%> <S%H4975><s%> even <S%H4605>upward,<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H2096>brightness,<s%> as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of <S%H2830>amber.<s%>

And he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> the <S%H8403>form<s%> of a <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> me by a <S%H6734>lock<s%> of mine <S%H7218>head;<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> lifted me <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> me in the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> that <S%H6437>looketh<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north;<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> was the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of the <S%H5566>image<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy,<s%> which provoketh to <S%H7065>jealousy.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H8033>there,<s%> according to the <S%H4758>vision<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in the <S%H1237>plain.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north.<s%> So I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H4480>northward<s%> <S%H6828><s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5566>image<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> in the <S%H872>entry.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> furthermore <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H6213>do?<s%> even the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>committeth<s%> <S%H6311>here,<s%> that I should go far <S%H7368>off<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary?<s%> but turn thee yet <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H5750><s%> and thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H2691>court;<s%> and when I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2356>hole<s%> in the <S%H7023>wall.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H2864>dig<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> in the <S%H7023>wall:<s%> and when I had <S%H2864>digged<s%> in the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H6607>door.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, Go <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6311>here.<s%>

So I went <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H7200>saw;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8403>form<s%> of creeping <S%H7431>things,<s%> and <S%H8263>abominable<s%> <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2707>portrayed<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7023>wall<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

And there <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H4480>ancients<s%> <S%H2205><s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> with every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4730>censer<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and a <S%H6282>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> went <S%H5927>up.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> hast thou <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H2205>ancients<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H2315>chambers<s%> of his <S%H4906>imagery?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>seeth<s%> us <S%H369>not;<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> also <S%H413>unto<s%> me, Turn thee yet <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H5750><s%> and thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H6213>do.<s%>

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H1058>weeping<s%> <S%H854>for<s%> <S%H8542>Tammuz.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he <S%H413>unto<s%> me, Hast thou <S%H7200>seen<s%> this, O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man?<s%> turn thee yet <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H5750><s%> and thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> than <S%H4480>these.<s%> <S%H428><s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> were about <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> with their <S%H268>backs<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and their <S%H6440>faces<s%> toward the <S%H6924>east;<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> toward the <S%H6924>east.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, Hast thou <S%H7200>seen<s%> this, O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man?<s%> Is it a light <S%H7043>thing<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that they <S%H4480>commit<s%> <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H6311>here?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they have <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> with <S%H2555>violence,<s%> and have <S%H7725>returned<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger:<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> they <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2156>branch<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> their <S%H639>nose.<s%>

Therefore will <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> in <S%H2534>fury:<s%> mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2347>spare,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I have <S%H2550>pity:<s%> and though they <S%H7121>cry<s%> in mine <S%H241>ears<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> yet will I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> them.
